sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"估价，估计"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: estimate, appraise, assess, evaluate, value, rate
means: estimate ： 通常指由个人作出的主观估价。
appraise ： 指以专家身份作了最终精确的估价。
assess ： 原义指对为确定交多少税而估计，引申指通过估价以便更好利用。
evaluate与appraise相似，指使判断绝对准确，但多用于对人物的某方面的评价，很少用于评价某物的市场价值。
value ： 侧重指一般人对某物的价值或价格所作的估计。
rate ： 专指评定价值等级的高低。

sentence.Network_en: An expert came to appraise the value of my antiques.
sentence.Network_cn: 一位专家来对我的古玩作了估价.

sentence.Network_en: An employer should appraise the ability of his men.
sentence.Network_cn: 雇主应该鉴定员工的能力.

sentence.Network_en: It is very high that people appraise to his thesis.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们对他的论文评价很高.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语常见词根前缀后缀大全 ... appoint 指定，任命 appraise 评价 appease 平息，绥靖.
是非_百度百科 ... [Discord] 口舌;纠纷 [Appraise] 评论;褒贬（appraise） [Right and wrong] 对与错;正确和谬误.
“品”字的解释 - 新华字典网络版·汉字字典频道 ... 品色〖 variety〗 品题〖 appraise〗 品脱〖 pint〗.
apportion 分摊,分配appraise 鉴别,评价apprehend 逮捕,忧惧

list.abs: 商贸英语词汇（海关、仓库、运输、WTO） ... allowance 津贴 appraiser 鉴定人 bonded warehouse 保税仓库.
会计财务术语中英文对照 - 豆丁网 ... appraisal 评估 appraisers 评估人员 appreciation 溢价.
__2013年MBA英语高频词汇_百度文库 ... applicable 适用的，合适的 appraisal 估计，估价，评价 appreciation 感谢，感激.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... appraise v 评估 appraisal n 评估，评价 precious a 珍贵的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English  (in the sense 'set a price on'): alteration of apprize,by association with praiseThe current sense dates from the mid 19th cent

entry.def: If you appraise something or someone, you consider them carefully and form an opinion about them.

example.ex: This prompted many employers to appraise their selection and recruitment policies...
example.tran: 这促使许多雇主考量其人才选拔和招聘政策。

example.ex: Gloria slid an appraising eye over the rest of the rack before reaching for the dress.
example.tran: 格洛丽亚以审视的眼光向货架上其余的衣服扫了一遍，才伸手去拿那件连衣裙。

means.word_mean: 1. place a value on; judge the worth of something;

sentences.sentence: "I will have the family jewels appraised by a professional"
"He appraised the situation carefully before acting"

auth_sentence.content: It's important to have enough self-discipline to hit the pause button and appraise a situation.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's important to have enough self-discipline to hit the pause button and appraise a situation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's important to have enough self-discipline to hit the pause button and appraise a situation.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 对……作出的评价;评价,鉴定,评估

stems_affixes.word_buile: ap加强动作+prais价值,估价+e→给以价值→评估

stems_affixes.value_cn: 赞扬, 歌颂, 称赞
stems_affixes.word_buile: prais价值,估价+e→[高度]评价→赞扬, 歌颂

sentences.cn: 据他估计, 项链价值1000英镑。

sentences.en: The teacher appraised the pupil’s drawing.
sentences.cn: 老师评价了那个学生的画。
